backend/main.mo: Defines product, collection, and contact types, initializes catalog data, and stores products, collections, and messages in in-memory maps and lists.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence for frontend image mapping fixes and asset validation, listing related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of all major frontend files, including pages, components, hooks, and configuration assets.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS layers and defines extensive color variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and initializes the backend actor, wrapping the app in a CartProvider.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartProvide: Simple wrapper that renders children without adding logic, serving as a placeholder provider.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorSt: Displays a styled error message with optional retry button and destructive-themed visuals.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Shows a loading spinner with a customizable loading message.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via mutation hook, and success/error feedback UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, textured background, content wrapper, and a branded footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/HeaderNav.ts: Responsive header navigation with links, cart button, and mobile menu toggle using cart state and router.
frontend/src/components/theme/TextureBac: Renders a fixed repeating grunge-texture background layer with low opacity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand‑based persistent cart store with item add/remove, quantity updates, and subtotal/total calculations.
Mutation hook that sends contact form data to the backend via the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading via an auth client provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching collections, products, and individual product details using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme variables, fonts, and global utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/imagePaths.ts: Maps product image keys to generated asset paths with fallback and helpers for resolving image arrays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint that mounts the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with brand story, design pillars, and mission statement sections.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Provides a shopping cart interface with item listing, quantity controls, subtotal display, and empty-cart fallback.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, business hours, and a contact form for user inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero banner, feature highlights, and links to shop and about pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed product info including images, description, tags, quantity selection, and add‑to‑cart behavior.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Lists products with optional collection filtering and handles loading and error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a clothing website plan, known UI/image issues, and a large list of required product images for the build.
